entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
